Katie Couric took David Letterman inside the process of scheduling Sarah Palin 's interviews- the campaign actually rushed an interview because they didn't want a week to go by without hearing anything from Governor Sarah Palin , as Katie Couric put it- and said the campaign was`` very generous'' and gave her`` tremendous access'' to Sarah Palin . by those in the crowd opposed to the war in Iraq and its costs. Still, the applause drowned out the boos.`` It's good to be here,'' Donald Rumsfeld told the crowd. I have been around so long that I remember a time when CPAC did not exist, when Ronald Reagan was still an actor, when Barry Goldwater was our candidate for president and we only worried about socialism outside of the United States. Donald Rumsfeld joked that there's still time for Dick Cheney to get on the ballot in New Hampshire and Iowa.

said Friday that Andy Coulson had felt compelled to resign, but did not mention the scandal, which centers on allegations of systematic wrongdoing at Rupert Murdoch 's News of The World tabloid while he was in charge. I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, David Cameron said in a statement.`` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government.'' Mike Missanelli committed an unintentional violation while interviewing Eagles quarterback Michael Vick on his radio show yesterday. Mike Missanelli reminded Michael Vick that DeSean Jackson made some comments about the quarterback's game-ending interception against the Packers. What's the story with DeSean Jackson ? asked Mike Missanelli `` Is he just a young pup who talks out of turn every now and then and you're the wily veteran now, and you have to kinda hit the pup on the nose?''

`` Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti,'' Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people.
